sub_title: Director at MIMETAS - Grow. Learn. Discover.
summary: In  the  academic research field I developed myself into an independent, flexible and energetic scientist with good project management and communication skills. I am dedicated to my job and like to work towards practical applications and products . My positive attitude, great sense of responsibility and determination enable me to complete projects successfully. These traits also allow me to motivate my colleagues and integrate well within a team.

profile_positions.description: Member of the program committee for the annual meeting of the NVED
profile_positions.title: Member program committee NVED

profile_positions.location: Department of Dermatology, VUmc, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Eurostars project (in collaboration with Technical University Berlin and TissUse GmbH)

Title: Tissue engineered skin with human hair follicles for skin transplantation and in vitro skin testing  
Goal: Introduction of in vitro tissue engineered human hair follicle into a construct for skin transplantation and GMP optimization of production of this skin transplantation construct
Development of human in vitro skin model with hair follicles for medium to high throughput testing

Skills/tasks: 	
Perform technology transfer in collaboration with partners in the Netherlands and Germany, experimental research, research in line with GMP guidelines in Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) which are transferable, project planning, visit (inter)national meetings, writing (scientific  publications/ grants/SOP/reports), data analysis, reporting, organize meetings, assisting managing research group, teamwork, giving lectures, supervision PhD students (3x) and technician (1x), opponent PhD defense, programme committee NVED 
Assist with contract research with 3D in vitro human skin models. Tasks included communication and writing project proposals
profile_positions.title: Postdoc

profile_positions.description:
Connected running project is a successful relationship program of PwC. Customers, relations, partners and employees of PwC train together to deliver a running performance at a special location in the world.
I assisted in the monthly running training of the connected running project and the guidance of the participants during the running races.
profile_positions.title: Assistant-trainer connected running project

profile_positions.description:
Project of Netherlands Institute for Regenerative Medicine (NIRM)
Work package: Angiogenesis – generating new vessels
Topic: Skin vascularization to promote wound healing and improve tissue engineered skin with the use of in vitro (3D) skin models

Skills/tasks:	
Experimental and project planning, visit (inter)national meetings, data analysis, writing, reporting, assisting managing research group, giving workshops and lectures, supervision PhD students (3x) and MSc students (2x)
profile_positions.title: Post-doc

profile_positions.location: Department of Dermatology, VUmc, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Successfully defended my PhD thesis called "Development of a human tissue engineered hypertrophic scar model" on 12 March 2015 (Free University, Amsterdam, The Netherlands). The thesis can be downloaded from: http://dare.ubvu.vu.nl/handle/1871/52392

Skills/ tasks:	
Developed in an independent researcher; performing experiments, experimental and project planning, data analysis, communication, visit (inter)national meetings, writing, giving workshop, supervision internship BSc students (2x)
profile_positions.title: PhD-student
